summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 32nd Avenue South, from Lane Street to Dearborn Street; Dearborn Street, from 32nd Avenue South to 33rd Avenue South; 33rd Avenue South, from Dearborn Street to Charles Street; Charles Street, from 33rd Avenue South to Washington Boulevard; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Petition No. 77194 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds" and declaring an emergency.
